import React, { Component } from 'react' import ToyslandService from '../../services/ToyslandService' import Lateral from '../misc/Lateral' import { WithAuthConsumer } from '../context/AuthContext' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class Chat extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { chat: {} } } componentDidMount() { ToyslandService.showChat(this.props.match.params.id) // Porqué esto? Por que la url matchae con el .then(chat => { this.setState({chat: chat}, () => console.log('params', this.state.chat)) }) } render() { return(
Bandeja de Entrada
{this.state.chat.product && this.state.chat.product.category}
{this.state.chat.product && this.state.chat.product.name}
{/* {this.state.chat.products.productPicture} */}
) } } export default WithAuthConsumer (Chat)
